channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My Current Plan for this Market
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! The S&P 500 has officially entered my buy zone—but do I feel like buying? Not at all. And that’s exactly why I’m doing it. As l...

item.title: Is the Tech Sector Poised for a Comeback?
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! The Put/Call ratio just spiked above 1 again—a level that typically signals fear in the market. But here’s the twist: historica...

item.title: Could You Have Predicted the Selloff?
